revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Iceberg Ruins |image = [[File:Iceberg Ruins.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Iceberg Ruins. |tokens = 1,920,000 |location = North of Snowslide Slope }}
<!--T:2--> '''Iceberg Ruins''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Galar]]. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 6x6 in size, respectively; including 16 chest tiles, 38 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 31,507,840 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:3-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:4-->
<!--T:5--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Cryogonal.png|40px]] Cryogonal || rowspan=8 colspan=2| <center>N/A |- | [[File:Beartic.png|40px]] Beartic |- | [[File:Galarian Darumaka.png|40px]] Galarian Darumaka |- | [[File:Weavile.png|40px]] Weavile |- | [[File:Vanilluxe.png|40px]] Vanilluxe |- | [[File:Froslass.png|40px]] Froslass |- | [[File:Delibird.png|40px]] Delibird |- | [[File:Aurorus.png|40px]] Aurorus* |} '''*Note:''' Aurorus will only appear if the player has captured it previously.
<!--T:6--> ===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Glalie.png|50px]] Glalie || <center>149,662,240 || rowspan=2 colspan=3|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Regice.png|50px]] '''Regice*''' || <center>157,539,200 |} '''*Note:''' Must have made progress in [[Questlines#The Ancient Golems|The Ancient Golems]] Questline to unlock.
==Items== <!--T:7-->
<!--T:8--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Dowsing Machine}} || 3 || 32.46% || 31.43% || 27.08% |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Incense}} || 3 || 32.46% || 31.43% || 27.08% |- | {{Pokemon|Cryogonal|mimic}} || N/A || 10.82% || 10.48% || 9.03% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|White Shard}} || N/A || 10.11% || 10.69% || 13.14% |- | {{Bag2|Cyan Shard}} || N/A || 10.11% || 10.69% || 13.14% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Hard Stone}} || N/A || 1.35% || 1.77% || 3.51% |- | {{Bag2|Everstone}} || N/A || 1.35% || 1.77% || 3.51% |- | {{Bag2|Icicle Plate}} || N/A || 1.35% || 1.77% || 3.51% |}
